text: Suggest a correction Many people will say that money makes the world go round, but the truth is that the globe would come to a screeching halt without coffee. Rainy day? Coffee. Having trouble waking up? Coffee. Need a boost of energy? Coffee. There’s almost no occasion where a cup of coffee won’t be a welcome offering. Over the centuries, this delicious brown brew has garnered many fans, but some might even admit to being obsessed with coffee. Of course, everything should be enjoyed in moderation, but with so many tools, amazing gadgets, and methods for brewing coffee, it’s hard not to get carried away. Without a doubt, the first step to making exceptional coffee is having a great coffee bean grinder. If you have a friend or loved one who admits to being addicted to coffee, treat them to something special this holiday season. Whether it’s brewing a cup on the road, frothing milk for a better latte, or whipping up a delicious serving at home, there are plenty of items that make the perfect gift. Oh, and when in doubt, a bag of the “strongest coffee in the world” will make anyone smile. Edit product widget If coffee made using the French Press method is their favorite preparation, then this coffee maker is the perfect gift. The stainless steel press has a sleek black and walnut design and holds 24 ounces. The press lid has a stirring stick to disperse coffee grounds, and the fine filter on the end ensures they don’t escape. Edit product widget Stanley is renowned for its durable, heavy-duty liquid containers, and this gift set is perfect for anyone who wants to make their own pour-over coffee. It uses stainless steel filters to extract oils and flavors, and all you have to do is pour hot water into the filter and listen to it flow into the cup below. Edit product widget Original on-the-go coffee maker, there’s no better portable gadget for producing a delicious cup of coffee than this one. It is perfect for people who work in different locations, who don’t want to spend a fortune in cafes or for those who want fresh coffee while camping. Edit product widget You’ll never look at filter coffee the same way again if you prepare it with this gadget from Technivorm. A modern take on the simple percolator method, it features a sleek design with a separate tray for the filter and a dedicated receptacle for the water. Edit product widget A coffee in a hurry or on the go? It’s no problem if you throw this portable coffee press in your bag. Easy to clean and space-saving, the Aeropress Go can brew a cup of pour-over, French press, or espresso coffee almost instantly. It can prepare up to three servings from one batch of ingredients. Edit product widget Leave your guests amazed when you offer to make them a cup of coffee with this Chemex coffee maker. It has a large 8-cup capacity and is made from the highest quality non-porous borosilicate glass. The design allows coffee to be covered and refrigerated for reheating without losing its flavor. Edit product widget Few things are as delicious as coffee you make yourself. From grinding the beans, tempering the grounds in the machine, to smelling the brew slowly pouring into your cup, this espresso machine makes you feel like a real barista in your own home. Edit product widget If you regularly buy drinks in a cafe, you will know that it is expensive. To always get your coffee fix at a fraction of the cost, the Nanopresso is a small, portable gadget that instantly brews espresso on the go. Edit product widget When you’re making a latte or cappuccino, you’ll often need a gadget to turn milk into delicious foam. It’s incredibly difficult to do if you don’t have the right tools for the job, which is why this electric frother makes it easier. It creates coffee-quality foam in a short time and is easy to clean. Edit product widget If you need to whip milk into foam but don’t see the need for a coffee-grade electric gadget, this simple hand frother will definitely do the trick. It runs on AA batteries, so it will also be ready when you need it. Simply insert the end of the wire into the milk, turn it on and run it for a few minutes. Edit product widget Plant-based milk is generally more expensive than cow’s milk, but a more affordable option is to make it yourself. This gadget is the perfect kitchen tool if you want to try your hand at making almond milk, and it comes with detailed instructions on how to get started. The milk machine produces five to six cups per batch. Edit product widget You have a smart TV, but do you have a smart mug? Create a much smarter home with this mug that pairs with your cell phone. Through the Ember app, you control the cup temperature and customize presets, and it reaches up to 145 degrees. Edit product widget If you’ve ever picked up your coffee, took a big sip, and realized it was ice cold, you’ll appreciate the importance of a self-heating mug. The handcrafted ceramic Ui mug contains metal particles in the base, and when placed on the wireless stand, it maintains the coffee temperature at 130 degrees. Edit product widget This double-walled mug features vacuum insulation to keep your drinks at the optimal temperature for longer. The non-stick coating inside makes cleaning easy and the lid has a two-step clip that prevents splashing when opened. Edit product widget Single-use paper or plastic cups are not only bad for the environment, they can also make your coffee taste different. The best way to enjoy coffee is in a glass or ceramic mug, or if you’re on the road or in a hurry, in a reusable tempered glass travel mug. KeepCup is an extremely popular favorite, and this one holds 12 ounces and has a sturdy lid. Edit product widget Good coffee deserves a good cup, and you can’t go wrong with a selection from Bodum. This bistro-style mug is made of double-walled, heat-resistant borosilicate glass and has a 10-ounce capacity. Edit product widget Whether on the road or in the office, make sure your favorite beverage stays at the optimal temperature. This 20 ounce tumbler from Yeti is insulated to perfectly keep cold drinks cold and hot drinks hot. It has a stylish flip lid to prevent spills. Edit product widget You may have all the tools you need to make the perfect drip, pour-over, or filter coffee, but if your measurements are incorrect, things won’t taste the way they’re supposed to. This is why it is important to have an accurate kitchen scale with a built-in timer. Edit product widget An electric coffee bean grinder is the quickest, cleanest way to prepare your morning brew. It features an easy-to-use dial on the front to adjust the grind length and a rotary dial on the base of the container to change the coarseness of the grind. Edit product widget Attractive and stylish, this kettle will look great in the kitchen or on a serving tray when entertaining guests. Made from durable 304 stainless steel, the cordless kettle gets to work when placed on the 1,200-watt rapid-heat element, which features an LCD display to set your desired temperature. Edit product widget Simplicity can also be beautiful, as these teaspoons and teaspoons demonstrate. Made from food-grade stainless steel, these 2-tablespoon scoops are the perfect kitchen accessories for accurately measuring ground coffee. Edit product widget Need your coffee fix quickly, but not near a coffee shop or kettle? That’s when a gadget like this immersion heater comes in handy. Simply plug it into a wall outlet and immerse the heater in your container of water. In just seconds you’ll have boiling water for a quick cup of coffee. Edit product widget It is important to grind coffee beans as needed and never use more than you need. However, some electronic grinders require a minimum amount to function properly, which may be more than you need. This manual grinder is perfect for preparing individual portions. Edit product widget There are a lot of steps that go into making a perfect cup of coffee, but you can’t forget the cleaning part. This is why it is important to have a good quality coffee canister, so you can easily dispose of ground and brewed coffee beans. This way you won’t have a big mess in the trash and it will make the process easier. Edit product widget Besides humidity, one of the biggest enemies of coffee beans is exposure to oxygen in the air. This container is perfect for keeping your beans in the best possible shape because it features an interior lid that eliminates any air inside. This helps keep beans, tea or sugar fresh for longer.
